title: Clay Travis and Buck Sexton Show H3 – Mar 16 2022
itunes:title: Clay Travis and Buck Sexton Show H3 – Mar 16 2022
description:
Polls shows majority support for Florida banning the teaching of sexual orientation and gender identity in lower grades. FL Governor Ron DeSantis takes on Disney. Mitt Romney is the lone Republican to vote against overturning travel and child mask mandates. Wisconsin Senator Ron Johnson joins Clay and Buck to give his reaction to Zelensky’s address to Congress and Biden's plans for Ukraine and covid. Senate passes bill to make daylight saving time permanent. C&B pitch a 4-day workweek. Unvaccinated Yankees and Mets players are ineligible to play MLB games this year in New York City, despite the fact that the games are outdoors.

Learn more about your ad-choices at https://www.iheartpodcastnetwork.com

Follow Clay & Buck on YouTube: https://www.youtube.com/c/clayandbuck

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
